concept.title: Overview
concept.shortdesc: As a supervisor, you can access the application to manage custom properties tailored to the requirements of your business. For example, you can define properties to capture additional business data related to ERP inbound messages.

conbody.p:
Using this application, you can:
Access the existing property definitions.
Create a property definition.
Link properties to a group.
After you define the properties in the application, the same properties are configured in the other applications such as , , and for you to use them.
